content.detailedDescription: The power flickered on and off which woke my boyfriend up when his lamp (touch sensitive) turned on. he woke me and asked me to check out what he was seeing out the window. i opened my eyes and immediately saw the blue light flashing on then off. i thougt it was a police car stopping someone on the street. i looked out the window and noticed the bright blue light. it looked like it originated about 50 yards away in the neighbors yard right next to or on the street. it was about 2 feet from the ground. it flashed and lit up the entire sky as bright as lightning. it was raining that night. when it wasn't flashing, the sky was black. it continued to flash 5 or 6 times more then stopped. after it stopped we both tried to figure out what it could have been. we came to the conclusion that it might have been a downed power line or something electrical, so we called the police to report it, especially as it seemed to interfere with the power. the police instructed us to call the fire department who came to investigate. they couldn't find any downed power line or anything out of the ordinary. a couple hours later the local utility company, unitil came to the house to investigate followed by the police. we explained what we saw to them. they also checked the street, the neighbors property, our own property, but they found nothing as well.
content.summary: Bright flashing blue light.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work and we had been moving things to storage, my coe-workers were inside and i was outside near the back door where there is a great view of buffalo mountain.  at this time i saw a jet that looked like an f-16 fly unusually low from vail towards frisco, it then took a large turn northward around buffalo mountain and toward the gore range and i lost sight of it.   right after that i noticed a silver circular object that was hovering behind the southern side of buffalo mountain.  i had been watching the sky that day and this object was much lower than any of the jets i had observed, besides the f-16.  the whole event from the time i saw the f-16 to when the ufo left was around 30 seconds.
content.summary: F-16 sighting followed by brief ufo sighting.

content.detailedDescription: At our home in the ahwatukee area of phoenix (behind south mountain)on august 31, 2008 around 5-5:30 pm in broad daylight, my husband, myself, and my son all witnessed a ufo from our backyard. it was moving at a slow steady and purposeful speed heading from south to north above the i-10 freeway. to us, it appeared like three round white objects held together as if well affixed. at first, we were thinking balloons, but this did not drift of get smaller, it simply moved with forward motion without veering or going higher. we watched it make a trip towards the north for a good 15-20 minutes perhaps. even my completely skeptical husband said, "that's a ufo." i never reported it because i wasn't really sure if there was a central place to report to that would keep records. roger marsh from examininer online suggested i put this into your database. we see a lot of strange things in the skies here, but this time we all saw it together, debated it, watched how it moved, and took photos, so i feel very good that as skeptical and logic-minded as we are, we couldn't explain this one. the only way it disappeared was that it moved north too far to see it any longer with the roof line in the way. it didn't seem to change altitude or veer one way or the other. it looked very purposeful. oh, and this made no sound at all from where we were. it was not directly overhead, slightly to the east of us, but very high in the sky so nearly overhead. it looked like three lobes attached to each other. to the naked eye, they appeared to clearly be three spheres attached to each other and very white in the blue sky.
content.summary: Triangle ufo in daylight witnessed by three people together.

content.detailedDescription: On dike patrol for the national guard on the james river, standing behind the store near the hwy 281 bridge.  at 4:15 am, myself and 1 other soldier were walking the dike, checking for seepage, breaches or leaks.  i have always had a habit at looking up and staring at the stars on clear nights.  we noticed an enormous object fly over our heads heading at a fairly slow rate going east by south-east.  we could not see any real shape to the aircraft but the there was a center red strobe light and three red lights going off of it in a low angle swept back wing pattern at an equal distance apart.  (the soldier that was with me thought there were four lights on the objects left side and three on the right).  there was no noise associated with the object.  we both estimated the object to be about half the size of a city block or 1/4 mile in width.  i tried to take a photo of it with my cell phone, but the pixel rate was too low and all i see is a completely black photo.  i called our operations center and talked to some of my peers about it, but faced ridicule and am not going to pursue it further.  this is the only ufo i have ever seen after over 25 years in the military.
content.summary: Enormous wing.

content.detailedDescription: I saw 6 to 8 lights in a straight line. equal distance between them. southeast of kingman, az. approximatly over the hualapai mountains. the lights blinked in order from west to east. about 2 seconds each. no more than 2 at a time except once, where 3 were visible. there was no light hues surrounding them. and there was moderate cloud cover. if the distance was accurate, then the lights were the size of small houses. if the distance wasn't exact, then the lights were the size of a small car. no real movement was evident. they turned on then off.
content.summary: Straight line of lights.

content.detailedDescription:
(i posted this at http://www.Homesfornh.Com/dish-network-tv/blog/watch-our-planet-on-dish-network/comment-page-1/#comment-629)

just to let you know, i did catch a ufo on 5/3/09, from 9:58am to 10:33am. what ever it was big. not nearly as big as them moon. i could tell it was moving fast because i know that the dishnet sat is 23000 miles from earth and this object moved from what looked like a realitively close proximity of the sat to past the earth in this time frame. i could get an idea of the size of the object because the curvature of the earth eclipsed it as it went past and behind the earth. it must have been emitting its own light because when it did pass by the earth, it traveled by the dark side, (over the western pacific and asia). i am not expert on this, it may just have been high enough to where it was reflecting light from the sun.

i have this recorded on my dvr.
content.summary: Seen on dishnet work channel 212 (dish earth).

content.detailedDescription:
A very strange dim incandescent beacon light approached at night from the right-hand side of the aircraft and passes across the path and then underneath the left wing in a matter of 20 seconds.

the beacon light was strange in that it was unilluminated (off) more than it was on. the interval was like one second-on and five seconds off, and we saw the light 4 times. we did not see any other running lights.

from the perspective of the path, i.E. relative motion, and the closing speed and angle, this light passed across the aircraft path at almost the same level and in very close proximity. ground-based lighting would take minutes to pass an aircraft travelling at 2.5 miles a minute, this light was not on the ground.

the first thought was that the light was attached to a military jet, but this has been dispelled by discussions with military aircrew after an unofficial enquiry two weeks later when i described the beacon. 


an aircraft does not normally sport a white running light, nor a single white beacon in the forward direction. a white light, except for landing lights, is reserved for the rear of an aircraft. when the beacon is unlight, it should be relatively easy to see one or more red or green navigation running lights when the aircraft is heading towards your own aircraft.

this sighting occured in the same designated remote area as a previous sighting.

the light was seen by the pilot and co-pilot almost simultaneously, and they both queried each other, "what is that?". unfortunately the corroborating witness is since deceased.

along with other unusual night time sightings, it is difficult to associate this white light with a known aircraft when none of the other expected tell-tale lights are present.

this is yet another unexplained night time sighting by two pilots, and easily dismissed as fleeting incident.
content.summary: Pilot sights strange incandescent beacon light pass close underneath left wing.

content.detailedDescription:
An unknown unidentifable air craft was sighted between merimbula and canberra sporting one continuous incandescent light approximately 3 miles in front of own aircraft, travelling at night, and moving with relative motion showing that it was at the same altitude and keeping pace only a few miles in front, while we were on descent from 9500' at 157 knots down to 7500'.

the incandescent light appeared to be the rear nav light of an aircraft, but there was no anti-collision strobe or beacon visible on the unknown.

own aircraft was in contact with airservices and the unknown was not reported as traffic despite being only a few miles in front for over 6 minutes.

the unknown rapidly descended through continuous cloud cover that was over 1000' thick and would have descended below lower safe altitude when the closing distance between own aircraft and was reaching two miles or less. 

even instrument rated pilots do not descend through cloud below lower safe altitude in the dark unless executing an approach procedure. the descent was rapid and in close proximity of high country and certainly not in the approach area of any airport. the light was visbile for more than 6 minutes above solid cloud but when we closed in on it, it just jumped down and went through cloud.

the unknown was sighted by two, slightly bewildered pilots. at no stage could any shape be determined, just distance and proximity.
content.summary: Pilot sights incandescent light on unknown craft at same altitude as own aircraft.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My father called telling me to rush to my uncles because they were staring at a ufo. i rush over and couldn't believe my eyes. there were two ufo's "playing" with each other. they were moving at high speeds and suddenly stop and hover. they were doing circles at high speeds. nothing no military aircraft can do. i called others who confirmed what i saw. it changed to either a solid red or a solid green ball of light. one went east in a high speed and the other disappeared west in a eradic fashion.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Numerous ufo's conducting fast eradict maneuvers

content.detailedDescription: Today in the morning around 5:20am, i woke up and went to the backyard to smoke. suddently, a circular object which looks as big as my little finger shoots in the sky and vanishes immediately. it just happens for less than one second so i thought i saw a shooting star. however, i realized that it was day time and the sky was bright and there's no way i could see a shooting star in this condition. 20 minutes later i observed a plane flew at the same height, and realized that there's nothing we know today that can fly that fast.
content.summary: An object glows blue light shot in the sky and then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I took the dog out in the back yard to potty at about 10pm.  i felt the urge to look up and to my right (west).  i saw a diamond shaped object bobing in the air.  it was very bright and changed colors.  i got my wife and daughter to look but they were sceptical.  to make sure i was seeing what i thought i was i got 2 neighbors to look.  we all saw the same thing.  while watching the ufo i believe it made a comercial airplane change course.  shortly after that i believe a small airplane went to intercept the ufo.  i can't say for sure because by that time the ufo was barely in sight.  it had moved a great distance to the west.  total view time 15-20 min.  i did use high powered binoculores to view the ufo as did my neighbors.  i know for a fact it was not a conventinal aircraft of any kind.  lets just say i didn't sleep well that night.  seeing is believing.  sighting took place on 5-3-09  between 10 and 10:30pm  in brooklyn park mn  near west broadway  and  85th ave   i lost sight of the ufo when it traveled west out of sight.
content.summary: Changed multi colors diamond like shape.

content.detailedDescription: I was headed to our summer getaway in rural ne pa. on us rt. 6 west about midway between milford and hawley pa. in the car were my late elderly father who was sleeping, and my wife who was listening to the radio with eyes closed and did not witness the event.(as it happened so quickly). i was on a fairly straight stretch of road approaching a slight curve to the left in a generally westerly direction. as the road went left and slightly downhill, in the woods straight ahead of me i saw, on the ground, approaching, a circle of orange light(like an old time heat lamp). it was the time of year when the twilight seems to last a long time. (the "gloaming", as the scots put it.) i was going about 45- 50 mph and the light on the ground seemed to be approaching slowly- at maybe 10- 15 mph. as it was not quite dark enough for headlights, i only had on the parking lights. as the light on the ground seemed to be on a "collision" course, i hit the brakes slightly. we did not collide and instincivly i looked in the side view mirror-- and to my surprise, i saw the "object" cross the road directly behind me and continue moving into the woods- behind and to the left of me in a generally  se direction. i say to my surprise because my first thought was that it was a reflection of my parking lights and how could that be possible- behind me? it was a circle of reddish orange light not as bright as the setting sun (like a heating lamp). i'd estimate it to be about 30 to 36 inches across. it was as though someone had held a stage light above the floor of the forest and was moving slowly through. i've hesitated to report this because it seems so implausible to me  - i can think of no logical explanation, and expect not to presented with one.   the car was a 94 pontiac transport mini van, if that matters.
content.summary: As though a stage spotlight from above moved through the floor of the woods.

content.detailedDescription:
Around 2 pm today, i went to the www.Trafficland.Com website in va, specifically the one traffic cam at the us29 and i-64 interchange in charlottesville (my boyhood hometown region).
 
the object in the right-center is very interesting.
 
it may be that this is part of a street light, with the pole obscured by whatever.  i have not enlarged the picture to examine it more closely as i wanted to send the raw picture for you to see.
 
it reminds me of the spacecraft in the movie, "independence day."
content.summary: Observed as still traffic cam picture.

content.detailedDescription: This object was first noticed by myself in night sky @ 8:51 pm central time going from west to east all the way across the sky from horizon to horizon in about a min. very faint had to look away from it to see it with periphreal vision it was so high up. no blinking lights. about 5 min. later saw it go back from east to west in same line it traveled previously from west to east. didnt see it for about 10 more min. then found it again going east to west again between the same stars. i have never witnessed anything like this before & it really freaked me out. i know this was not a plane it was so far up in the sky. i could see the stars brighter than this object. i am going to be watching again tonight. this thing was fast & it was almost like it was flying in a grid looking for something. no blinking lights at all just a faint red light. i finally dont have to beleive someone else ive seen it with my own eyes!!!!
content.summary: Red object from west to east & east to west back & forth.

content.detailedDescription:
It was just before bedtime and i was standing in the bathroom. then i see a very bright shine outside my bathroom window. at first i thought it might be a star or venus, but it did shine way brighter than any star. i see an other red light right behind it and the bright ligth has now become weaker. i run outside to my garden to see more clear. the bright light has now started to pulsate and has fade away little. the red light is now stronger. then suddenly i see an other white light and it has became an triangle. it's moving to the west. all the lights is now very weak, and it's just an spot in the sky. 

all this happends about under two minutes. while i'm seeing the object i dont feel anything, but afterwards i was chocked. 

i did lose sight of the object (triangle) when it disapared high up. 

/ [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Strange triangle object in sky over south sweden.

content.detailedDescription:
I was going down hwy 78 headed west toward hwy 285 on friday night 5/1/09.  it was a cloudy, rainy night but no thunder or lightning (up to this point).  suddenly there was a large lightning bolt that spread all the way across the sky (no thunder before the bolt, just the bolt).  my boyfriend and i both noticed how huge it was and i said "wow, that was beautiful", especially since it was so huge. i continued to look at the sky hoping it would happen again.  that is when some white lights caught my attention out the corner of my eye.  i looked over and that is when i noticed some white lights off to my right over the tree line.  i thought it was a plane at first but the lights were really bright and low.  i always look at the sky (both day and night) and i always look at planes and their flashing lights, so doing as i usually do, i continued to watch the lights.  truth is i am an avid ufo/alien researcher and a sky watcher, so i am always on the look out for something interesting in the sky.  so i looked at the lights and i noticed that they were all white, in a triangle shape and not flashing as usual so i watched it longer.  i wanted to see what it looked like once it came out from behind the tree line and came closer to the highway.  (i am used to watching planes at night so i wasn't expecting to see what i saw, i expected nothing more then just another plane.)  but when it came out from behind the trees i thought to myself, "is that a triangle?".  so i looked at it more carefully.  that is when i noticed that there were four white lights on it.  i could only see the bottom and there was a light on each corner and one in the very center.  only the center light flased (pulsed) on & off.  at this point i was kinda thrown off because i didn't recall ever seeing a plane with lights that don't blink on the wings and i started freaking out a little (in my mind).  i told myself to calm down and look at it again before it moved over the car and out of my line of sight.  and this time i told myself to look for the wings (thinking that would be the end of it) but that is when i realized that i couldn't see the  outline/shape of wings and that the shape really was a triangle because i could clearly see the shape of the craft because of the light colored clouds in the sky that night (it was a really cloudy night and the clouds were kinda lit up from the city lights if you understand what i mean.)  it was flying under the clouds deck and i could clearly see that it was black and to my utter amasement it was shaped like a triangle.  there were no wings, only a perfect triangle.  the strangest part is that right as i noticed that it was actually a triangle i noticed that is wasn't flying straight but rather from right to left going over the highway.  i have never seen anything fly like that except for helicopters and helicopters never look like that object did (day or night).  

the craft moved over the car and i couldn't see it anymore because we were still moving down the highway going away from it.  when i tried to look back and see it again i could only see light, not shape or anything else.  i continued to watch the sky to see if i could see a plane or anything flying under the clouds like that craft was and i didn't see anything for hours after my sighting.  and not only that, there wasn't anymore lightning for at least two hours or so after we got home.  my boyfriend was driving the car at the time and i was so freaked out at what i'd seen that i didn't mention it to him.  along with the fact that i thought he would make fun of my for thinking that i saw something considering how much i am into ufo's and aliens.  i did build up the courage to tell him later that night but when i told him he said that he didn't believe me because i didn't tell him as soon as i saw it.

i really saw something that night.  i wish i'd told him to look so i wouldn't be alone on this but like they say "hind sight is 20/20".  now i am alone with my thoughts and questions.  and the worst part is who knows if i will ever see something like that again.  flying low and clearly visible.  wow, i finally saw one!  weird weird weird
content.summary: Triangle shaped craft w/ white lights underneath and the center light flashing on and off.

content.detailedDescription: At 11:07 i walked into my bedroom and i looked out the window due north from my home and saw one bright non-blinking star-like light.  the sky was clear and there was no other moving lights in the sky at that time.  i can see planes on final approach to lax in that same direction, but this light was much higher on the horizon and not moving e to w as the planes do.  at first i thought it was a helicopter approaching from the n toward the s, but the object moved slowly and erratically, forward and back unlike any aircraft of any kind.  the object was as bright in the sky as the lights on an aircraft might be if it were in the area.  it odd direction it moved and its brightness made it quite noticeable in a dark and quiet sky. there was no color, only white light like a star.  the object moved around the ne sky for several minutes and then dove to the s suddenly and was lost on the horizon.  in a few minutes the light appeared again, but with a companion light about 10 degrees to the nw of the original object.  the lights moved in perfect tandem around in the nw sky, again much higher than the planes which i could still track low in the sky on their approach to lax.  i got a second witness to physically observe with me and she saw the same thing.  we both also thought that someone on the planes, a passenger or even a pilot, must have seen them unless they were too far n in the sky for them to be seen from the windows on the planes. the tandem lights moved, slowly at first, erratically, but still in tandem.  at one point the original object brightened and dimmed and the companion light did the same thing about five seconds later.  they moved quickly around the n sky for a couple of minutes, brightening and dimming and moving erratically, then pausing and hanging motionless in the sky.  they were stationary for several minutes and then finally dove quickly and brightly directly down to the horizon in the n sky.  there was no sound that accompanied the lights.  i remember thinking that i could not believe what i was seeing.  i was transfixed, tracking the movement and i knew i needed to get someone to see it with me and i did.  i called two friends but no one answered the phone at that hour. i'd wished that i had a camcorder available, but i did not.  after the event, no other activity was noted.  i remained at watch alone for another hour, but no reoccurance.
content.summary: Erratically moving single, then double star-like in n skies over los angeles.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i along with our young son were driving by white hills, az on the us 93 leaving las vegas, nv towards kingman, az. my husband was telling me about lights that he sees in the sky in this area often and about a diff encounter he had a month ago (will file a seperate report). he was explaining to me what the craft looked like when he pointed ahead towards the left of the highway above white hills town and said 'there it is!'
   i saw a very bright object in the sky hovering (not moving) in the same spot. i immdiately thought it was probably just a plane but the white light was way too bright and big. it was large and watching it i realized it was not moving. we watched it for a minute then pulled over into the middle of both sides of the highway (it is a good sized dirt/brush area in middle) and we watched it. you could barly see small lights lined up on it (about 4 or so when you squinted, it was far away/small but could still make out) it appeared to be more boomerang shaped by the way the lights were lined on it but it was so far away i cant be exactly sure but to offer these observations. 
   soon after we stopped on side to watch the bright light turned off and a small red blinking light on the bottom turned on and it began to move towards las vegas. it appeared to 'transform' into a plane (moving and light looking like a plane). my husband told me that is what they do transform to be like planes if you stop to watch (it happened the last time he saw it). 
   we got back in the truck and a couple minutes later we saw another bright stationary light just a little farther where the first one appeared. it looked the same as the first hovering and stationary. we didnt stop immediately until a couple minutes later another bright light appeared near this one but alittle higher in the sky. we  pulled over again and watched them both. the one we saw before the other still appeared to be stationary but it made a weird loop circular motion (to the right, up, left and back where it was-in a circle) quickly. it did that a couple of times. after watching for a few minutes the 'first' one turned the bright white light off and turned the red blinking light on as well, like the very first one that had already flown away. it started moving in the same direction as the other one, moving exactly like a plane and blinking similar to one. we watched the last one (3rd) one for a bit more and got back on the road and started driving again. 
   the 3rd bright white light started moving in our direction for a a little while then it turned off its bright white lighting and the red light like the others blinked on and it started traveling toward vegas like the other 2 did before it. once thier red lights kick in the look like a plane, you wouldnt think twice about it unless you saw its bright white light and it hovering stationary, or moving weirdly, or simply appearing but again the red lights seems brighter or bigger then the average blinking airplane light. my husband said they looked exactly like the one he previously saw a month ago except that one had blue lights blinking as well as the red when it turned the bright white off and it was a more detailed sighting then these (craft wise). also the lights seemed to be flying lower than a regular airplane.
   after we saw these things we were scanning the sky for more but found none. we got home and looked up sightings in white hills but didnt find too much, then looked up dolan springs and found someone asking 'anyone know of any vortexes,cold plasma shields,u.F.O���s or any other oddities in or near dolan springs,az?' asked on february '09 so others must be seeing these things. searching triangle shaped crafts there seems quite a few seen in az. we plan to be well equiped camera wise next time we are in the area and we are confident we may see these lights again since they seem to frequent that area.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: 3 triangle sightings in white hills, az (between the hoover dam and kingman, az).

content.detailedDescription:
Last night i saw a bright flash of light while out on the porch a few minutes later a large orb shaped object was hovering where the flash of light had occurred. it faded into almost invisible but i could see that it was still there.
tonight out on the porch again saw what looked like a comet or shooting star right above the tree line moving pretty fast but wasnt in my view very long. it was sort of an oval shaped white, firey object with a tail about 1 to 2 ft long. i supose it could have been a comet or shooting star about to crash in my neighborhood but i really dont think so. if it was then a fire should start soon very close by. i dont think the object was falling but it wasnt in my range of sight very long. if it was a comet it hit really close but there was no noise and i have seen very large shooting stars fairly close and you can hear them. besides this i think was too small to be a meteorite.
describe my reaction huh lets try holy s--t what was that!!! that was my reaction. i lost sight of it because it was moving and the neighbors house got in the way. i went outside and looked in that direction and not seeing any smoke yet if it was a meteorite.Its been about 15 minutes and still not hearing any sirenes from a recently started fire. i really dont think it was a meteorite but most likely a ufo.
content.summary: 2 seperate events see below

content.detailedDescription: Stped outside thinking about ym psycho exgf....Who looks like a pleadian....So do i...I looked it was tehre....I have a lot of expierance in this stuff...And been avidly researching in my own mind theorys of contact...This humbled me in a rerbly way as im not the swiftest thing to tlak too in the universe...Was the night sky...Yellowish...Turned into two stars and was gone....Also...Saucer shaped cloud apeared afterwards...Kinda like idk...Some tranendetal stuff..It was sideways like orions belt..
content.summary: Star blurs and dispears

content.detailedDescription: I and my son went to pick up my wife from work,the time was 4:50pm,it was a nice clear day and we parked by the frount door of the restraunt,and was just sitting in the car, and talking,and not much time went by and my son looked up and blared out!..What is that! and i replyed what is what? my son said that! so i leaned over in the car to look,and right above us was a black triangle! i was shocked to say the least! we just sat there looking at this thing i almost couldn't beleve i was seeing this!There was a black triangle just flooting by it made no sound and it was slowly turning in a clockwise rotation and was moveing about 5,to 10mph,i would say it was about 1500 ft in the air it looked like it was at lest 50 to 60 ft long and at lest 20 ft tall,and the top of it was in the shape of a dome but the top changed colers like it was airadesent the colers wentfrom black to a yellowish green to a blue then there was some red coller in it to! we watched this thing floot by then it begain to slowly gain hight and it was going in a westernly direction but as it gained hight it changed to a northwesternly direction and we watched this thing tell it disapered from sight! we looked at each other and i looked at the time and it was alittel after 5:10pm i told my wife but she gives me static about it ! but i don't care!! we ! my son and i know what we seen !!I know it wasn't a ballon!Or a plain! or even a helocopter!I grew up by a airforce base when i was young and i know what those things are but this ! it was a black triangle !! i don't realy know what to think ! but i know one thing for sure i look up alot more now!
content.summary: Waiting 4 wife 2 get off work son looked up and asked what is that! i looked and seen a triangle!

content.detailedDescription: We saw it from our backyard as we were noticing the planes landing at dia must be in a landing pattern taking them over the golden/wheat ridge area tonight. it was while looking skyward we noticed the dot. it was a black dot that just floated; looked like it was hovering or being blown on wind currents. it looked to be very high in the sky. we couldn't see any more detail than "dot" until we got the binoculars out.(regrettably, our point and shoot digital camera didn't get a good shot of it at all). then we ran and got the neighbors and they looked at it with the binoculars and they also thought it looked like a big turtle (round body, with protruding 'head'). we concurred. it wasn't frightening, just odd, truly an unidentified flying object...A giant turtle balloon????? it finally floated westward toward the mountains until we lost sight of it on the horizon over the roof of our neighbors house. we were just glad they got to see it too!
content.summary: Black dot at first, then with binoculars, it was round on a pole (like an axis).

content.detailedDescription: Para ser honesta solo me di cuenta cuando vimos la foto, la tomamos sin querer y  la envio para ver si es un u.F.O.
content.summary: Para ser honesta solo me di cuenta cuando vimos la foto, la tomamos sin querer y  la envio para ver si es un u.F.O.

content.detailedDescription:
Around 2:00 a.M on 4/28/09 a friend and i were visiting on the balcony of a condo in orange beach, al. it is located maybe two hundred yards east of perdido pass on hwy 182 near the al/fl border. the balcony faces the ne. 

as we were talking, i noticed what looked like a very bright, 
white star low in the sky to the nne. it caught my eye a few times because it was so bright, but otherwise it didn't seem too unusual. we could see the sky very well that night/morning and it just looked like a really bright star amongst many other stars. 

maybe the fourth time i noticed it (over about 30 minutes) i saw it descend rapidly for a pretty good distance.(maybe from about 50 to 30 degrees in just a blink) 

it looked like a shooting star, except it just stopped on a dime and hung there unchanging for at least a couple of minutes before fading into a reddish color and "blinking out" (see below). 

when i saw it "fall", i told my friend and ran inside to grab a camera. then we both watched it sit in the sky and disappear. the video camera is new and i didn't know how to operate it very well, so i was unable to document the first sighting. 

over the next half hour or so we saw it appear and reappear in the sky 10-12 times. the first 8-10 times we saw it, the object would usually initially appear to be a bright star moving slowly in the sky. most of the time it was moving very slowly from e to w or was stationary then it would change colors and then just disappear or dissolve. 

we saw it turn blue, white, green, red, orange, and yellow (at least). 
sometimes it would change colors instantly, other times it would sort of rapidly blink different colors. when the object disappeared, it would turn a dull red color and sort of dissolve.(see the video)
we heard no noise, but it appeared to be very far away. 

the object would appear for 30-60 seconds each time before disappearing. 
(*note - the first time i saw it before it "fell" it was sitting in one place for about 30 minutes) 

the last two times we saw it, the object initially appeared as just the dull red color. it behaved the same as before except that it appeared to be moving up in the sky. 

when we saw the object we didn't know what it was but figured (or at least hoped) it had a us military origin. at the beach there is a lot of air traffic in general and we are very close to pensacola naval air station also, hours earlier on the 27th we saw a number of military aircraft flying over towards pensacola nas. 

even so, what we saw is certainly not something either of us had ever seen before and we both spend a lot of time in orange beach. 

the video is very, very shaky because it is hand held and super zoomed in. the object is only moving slightly west to east or stationary...Not jerking all over the place. you can see the object "blink out" two or three separate times. the last one is the easiest to see. 

the video is in two parts that were recorded about ten minutes apart. other than trimming out parts, nothing has been done to alter the video. it has sound, but only of us talking, so i took that out. 

i was able to capture the object only three times as i was new to the camera and i was having trouble getting it to focus on the object because it was so far away. i was unable to record the last sightings because the red was too dull for the camera to pick up/focus on. 

the camera used to capture the video is a sony handycam dcr-sx40 with a 60x optical zoom. all of the video is zoomed in all the way. all of the settings are factory...I assume. 

so to recap, it first appeared to be in the sky beyond bayou saint john in the general direction of arnica bay / josephine, al. it stayed in approximately the same 1/8 of the sky, but appeared/reappeared seemingly at random in all different parts of that 1/8th. it stayed in a range of approx. 60 to 20 degrees. 

the ufo hung around in one general area for about 30 minutes, then fell rapidly for some distance, then just randomly disappeared and reappeared in different parts of the sky for about 30 minutes until finally reappearing as just a red dull color and moving slowly from n to ne for about 10 minutes until blinking out for good.
content.summary: Starlike object moved around the sky changing colors appearing and disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: The reason i am reporting this now is my brother who has recently became a mufon investigator told me i should report this sighting. my friend and i had this sighting several years ago in a town called sanger. i don't remember the exact date but it was between 1996 and 1997. it was a friday night and we were at my cousins house getting ready to go out to a casino. it was 10:00 p.M. and my friend and i were waiting outside for my cousin, we were talking and i noticed something in the night sky. i looked up and i saw this black object floating slowly across the sky. i told my friend to look up where she saw the object and she freaked out and ran inside. i, on the other hand kept looking at the object as it floated from north-west to south-east. the object was not making any noise. i really don't remember the size or the shape but it was sort of long and retangular in shape. this was a long time ago and it is hard to remember the specifics. i saw the object for about 10 seconds until i ran inside. we told my cousin but he did not believe us. we did not go back outside until my cousin was ready to go. by that time the object was gone and we went to the casino.
content.summary: Friend and i went outside and saw a black object moving very slowly no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
First thought - a big meteorite coming down burning in the air
then - a burning plane
but when the trajectory become smoothly changing from down to horizontal and then slightly upward i understood it was not a meteorite.
then it went slightly upward fromn me into the dark sky.
sorry, no photos
content.summary: Fireball or yellow/reddish glowing ball going by variable trajectory.

content.detailedDescription:
We lived in a small farming community & in an old farm house. we had no bathroom facilities inside, just an outhouse that was a good walk from the house.  one spring night, sometime between 2:00 & 3:00am, i woke up with a great need to go to the bathroom.  i drug myself out of bed, through the house & into the dark.  as i went around the coal shed toward the outhouse, i realized that it was perfectly quiet, no cricket or frog sounds.  i had the impluse to look up.  when i did, i saw an object that was right over the coal shed. it was round & was about 30 ft across.  it was about 40 ft. above me.  the object did not move or make a sound.  there were lights around the bottom.  there was a red light that held my attention.  i couldn't stop looking at it.  i can remember wondering it the object was a helicopter.  i had heard that copters could hover without falling, but i'd never seen one. staring at the red light was the last thing that i remember about it.  the next thing i remember is that i woke up in bed.  this happened for ten nights in a row.  the only difference was that when i'd go off the back porch, i would hear the old screen door slap, then i'd wake up in bed the next morning.  this was happening back in 1955.  i tried to tell my parents about it, but of course they convinced me that i was just dreaming.  even though i don't remember the details, i know that i had a real experience.

i've had other things happen to me that i realize must be connected to my childhood experience.  but of course i don't remember the details.  i must have had the fear of god put into me for me not to remember. 

i know you can't do anything with this, but it sure has made me feel better to share it with folks that might understand it.
content.summary: 10 days of night visits when i was 11.

content.detailedDescription:
I arrived home from visiting with friends, a few minutes from my home.  i exited my vehicle and walked toward the front door of my home, approximately 50 feet from the driveway.  i observed two circular lights in the sky above my head.  the lights continually circle 360 degrees, meeting half way in between, and turning clockwise.  when the lights meet again, they continue counter-clockwise.  i have never seen anything like this prior to tonight.  furthermore, i have observed low flying helicopters around my home to this date, and i wonder if the helicopter activity has anything to do with this current activity.  

the objects are still continuing.  i am not afraid, as i do not believe in extraterestial activity, but i am very curious as to what experiments/projects may be in progress in my area.  furthermore, i attempted to take photographs and video, to no avail.
content.summary: Two vague light type objects flying in a constant 360 degree circle clockwise and counterclockwise.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in my yard when a strange feeling came over me as if i was being watched. i then went in the house and got my camera and just started taking
photos of the sky. i could see or hear anything but their was that feeling that i had. later on i was looking at my pics when i notice this thing in the clouds.
content.summary: A dark solid planet looking object reddish brown color.

content.detailedDescription:
Flying triangle. sounded like a quiet jet. lights on the points of the triangle. i thought i saw a vertical stableizer from the rear of the triangle once it passed me. it was flying pretty low maybe 500 ft. or less. i could still hear it for a long time after it was out of site. 

i pulled up to my house at 602 iva ln at 11:38pm eastern time. as i stepped out of my truck i saw what i thought was just a plane flying at me from the north-east. but it caught my eye because the light configuration seemed different than what im used to seeing. so i stood in the street and watched it as it flew over my house from north-east to south-west. as it got directly over head i could see from the bottom the craft appeared to be a solid triangle with lights on the points.
content.summary: Triangle.
